name: NWError
desc: The errors returned by objects in the Network framework.

items.name: case posix(POSIXErrorCode)
items.desc: A POSIX error, which is used for most network protocol and routing errors.

items.name: case dns(DNSServiceErrorType)
items.desc: A DNS error encountered in resolving, browsing, or advertising.

items.name: case tls(OSStatus)
items.desc: A TLS error reported by a TLS connection or listener.

items.name: var localizedDescription: String
items.desc: The localized description of the error.

items.name: static func != (NWError, NWError) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether two values are not equal.
